Question
========

According to John Chambers, in R, everything that exists is an [[1]], and everything that happens is a [[2]].

Which ordered pair of words replaces [[1]] and [[2]] to best complete the sentence?

Answerlist
----------

* object, function call
* thing, object
* object, method call
* function, object
* matrix, function call

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct.
* No, "thing" is not a technical term.
* No, not all functions are methods. 
* No, not all things that exist are functions. 
* No, not all things that exist are matrices.
